data.title: good bagels and coffee
data.text: if you're looking for good bagels, pastries and coffee, this place is for you! we've always enjoyed dining here.

data.title: Great bagels and bagels sandwich
data.text:
Wonderfull establishment to enjoy a great tasting bagel or a bagel sandwich.
So many varieties of bagels freshly backed,  large selection of cheeses...
You can have coffee, juices, soft drink etc., what a comfortable place to enjoy a meal on the run.
Very friendly staff, always greats you with a smile.
Defiantly a place to return and enjoy another bagel!!!

data.title: Great bagels, slow service!
data.text: I like to run for a great untoasted, unadulterated, simple bagel.  Invariably I get caught in a line of people waiting for their orders and one very slow cashier filling part of the order and ringing up sales.  Why do the have a cash register at the order end if they don't use it?

data.title: nom nom nom !
data.text: In addition to the delicious fresh bagel creations, I would like to say: Bravo and kudos to the staff at this particular Einstein ... there is always a smile, good morning and thank you from the staff. As a member of their email program, there are often BOGO items, i.e. today for my June birthday: Buy a beverage and receive a complimentary egg sandwich. My choice of Bacon & cheddar presented a yummy brunch item. Monday is buy a dozen fresh bagels for $6, such a deal!

data.title: Nice place to sit and enjoy
data.text: Had an everything bagel with veggie cream schmear, bagel was toasted but still soft.  Also had a white chocolate mocha which was very good.  Did some work while there. Wifi good.  Seems like locals were frequenting

data.title: Easy for breakfast for business days
data.text: Great plain and fancy bagels, hot coffee, cheery staff, and quick service--best Einstein's I have used in three years!

data.title: Bagel selection was lacking on my visit
data.text:
I like the Einstein Bros bagels.  On visits to other stores, the bagel selection was quite extensive.  This one seemed like a subset only.  And looking for the counter, it would seem like the asiago cheese bagels did not have a lot of cheese on it.

The food was still good though.  Just that this store did not have same selection of bagels on my visit.
